channel.title: TELL ME HOW I DID! Revolver ((1.7)) -MORE DETAILED- (Primitive!)
channel.description:
[b][size=20pt]Scroll farther down to see the latest model![/size][/b]
[size=30pt]V0.2[/size] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/e6eetf.png[/img] It's not finished yet but I think it'll be beautiful once it has been finished. Hopefully it will be RS2 client compatible! Oh and by the way wings 3D smooths things like crazy but the bumps on the revolver "clip" have the normal indentation.
[size=30pt]V1.0[/size] EDIT: Alright i finished the low poly model, now i'm going too go farther into detail for other games. [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2zf8pwx.png[/img] [size=30pt]V1.5[/size] EDIT: I finished the render, and tweaked the model a bit! [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/ml0aiq.png[/img] [size=30pt]V1.6[/size] OK I edited the handle a bit.. I need more criticism. [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/vz8lza.png[/img] [size=30pt]V1.7 (Medium poly model)[/size] I tweaked the model a bit, and added a trigger, texture, and some screws. [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/sncsk6.png[/img]
